医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
液体限制不能改善心力衰竭患者的健康状况根据美国心脏病学院年度科学学院提出的一项研究，长期建议患有心力衰竭的人每天限制他们每天消耗的液体以帮助减少充血，或者肺部和四肢的液体堆积，但该建议没有任何好处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/fluid-restriction-does-not-improve-health-nealth-nealth-neart-failure-patients.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/fluid-restriction-does-not-improve-health-nealth-in-realth-neart-failure-patients.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=AA119E3D-A514-447D-8724-BB5B5B8423AF8D Mon, 31 Mar 2025 08:06:38 -0400 Fluid restriction does not improve health in heart failure patients
三部曲阀在治疗主动脉反流方面表现出安全性和有效性根据美国心脏科学学院的一项研究，接受了经过病原主动脉反流的瓣膜的经经经典主动脉瓣置换（TAVR）的患者的总体死亡率在一年时的总死亡率仅为8.1％，远低于试验的预先指定的目标25％，以表现出非劣质性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/trilogy-valve-dymstrates-safety-and-effectives-in-treating-aortic-regurgitation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/trilogy-valve-dymstrates-safety-and-effective-in--feltectives-in-warting-aortic-aortic-regurgitation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id= e6fffbc3-0f50-4cc6-a6cf-6f-6ffceccc75972 Mon, 31 Mar 2025 07:51:19 -0400 Trilogy valve demonstrates safety and effectiveness in treating aortic regurgitation
栓塞保护装置不会降低TAVR程序中的中风率根据美国心脏病学学院的一项随机试验，旨在去除栓塞材料的设备 - 在经导管主动脉瓣置换期间可以释放到血液中的组织碎片。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/embolic-protection-device-does-not-reduce-stroke-rate-rate-in-tavr-procedure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/embolic-protection-device-does-does-not-reduce-stroke-stroke-rate-in-tavr-procedure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=46dfd0c3-d175-4caf-8bee-2fa18c9cbbbbf Mon, 31 Mar 2025 07:43:55 -0400 Embolic protection device does not reduce stroke rate in TAVR procedure
使用通量工具评估颗粒漂移效应对口服药物吸收的影响发现使用通量工具的颗粒漂移分析如何改善药物研究中的口服药物吸收。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/Assessing-the-impact-of-the-particle-drift-effect-on-oral-drug-absorption-using-flux-tools.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/Assessing-the-impact-of-the-particle-drift-effect-on-oral-drug-absorption-using-flux-tools.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cfaf8b2d-69a4-4f4f4f-a8a5-725559639db7 Mon, 31 Mar 2025 07:22:00 -0400 Assessing the impact of the particle drift effect on oral drug absorption using flux tools
蒙大拿州的小型药店落后于Bill到Corral Pharmacy福利经理蒙大拿州的小型独立药房说，他们越来越多地挤满了药房福利经理的报销，并正在推动一项雄心勃勃的法案来控制他们所说的强大行业谈判者的不公平实践，称为PBMS。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/montanae28099s-small-pharmacies-behind-behind-bellind-bill-bill-bill-corral-pharmacy-pharmacy-bermacy-benefit-managers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/montanae28099s-small-pharmacies-behind-behind-bill-bill-bill-bill-to-corral-pharmacy-pharmacy-benefit-managers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=B3ED1395-150E-4C81-9248-641D79516E61 Mon, 31 Mar 2025 06:34:39 -0400 Montana’s small pharmacies behind bill to corral pharmacy benefit managers
“他们不会帮助我”：尽管有政策修复Sheldon Ekirch花了很多时间与她的健康保险公司在一起。有时，随着时间的流逝，她30岁的Ekirch在手机上打开了一个冥想应用程序。她的心理学家建议帮助与压力大而痛苦的医学障碍有关的抑郁症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/e28098they-wone28099t-help-mee28099-sickest-patients-patients-face-insurance-denials-denials-denials-denials-deftepite-policy-policy-policy-policy-policy-fixes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/e28098They-wone28099t-help-mee28099-sickest-patients-patients-face-insurance-denials-denials-denials-denials-defter-deft-policy-deft-policy-policy-policy-policy-fixes.aspx#comment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=90012533-72F5-4BC2-9735-71A165779265 Mon, 31 Mar 2025 06:31:39 -0400 ‘They won’t help me’: Sickest patients face insurance denials despite policy fixes
静脉注射铁显示出心力衰竭，射血分数减少有望根据美国心脏病学院年度科学学院（ACC.25）的一项研究，发现静脉内补充铁的心力衰竭患者心力衰竭（HFREF）（HFREF）（HFREF）（HFREF）（HFREF）是安全的，但结果混合了。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/intravenous-iron-shows-promise-promise-for-for-for-failure-with-redcection-extive-poction-fraction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/intravenous-iron-shows-promise-promise-for-for-for-failure-with-with-redcection-extive-poction-poction-fraction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c7bea199-f73c-4086-A42d-f5a836b28436 Mon, 31 Mar 2025 06:19:05 -0400 Intravenous iron shows promise for heart failure with reduced ejection fraction
基于AI的成像在指导心脏手术中的性能与超声相同在三个主要的冠状动脉动脉中，在三个主要的冠状动脉中至少缩小50％的患者在受超声基于超声的成像或由无创intelligence-power的新颖，人工智能驱动（AI）引导的，非侵入性成像技术引导的小说中的小型成像（AI）的研究中，同样良好的患者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/ai suped-imaging-mimaging-performs-equally-well-as-as-ultrasound-in-guining-hendert-procedures.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/ai oped-imaging-mimaging-performs-equally-well-as-as-ultrasound-in-rasound-in-guining-hernt-procedures.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=800AAD5C-6A5F-43D9-A3D5-B7B7B99B43302C Mon, 31 Mar 2025 05:42:41 -0400 AI-based imaging performs equally well as ultrasound in guiding heart procedures
心脏骤停的年轻运动员的生存率持续存在种族差异在过去的十年中，遭受心脏突然骤停的运动员的总体存活率有所提高，但是根据美国心脏病学学院的年度科学学院（ACC.25）（ACC.25），并在JACC中出版的特色临床研究表明，在种族中生存的可能性因种族而有所不同，心脏骤停发生了，运动员在崩溃时正在做什么。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/Racial-disparities-persist-in-survival-rates-for-young-athletes-with-cardiac-arrest.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/racial-disparities-persist-persist-in-survival-rates-for-young-young---------------------------------------------cardiac-arrest.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9250EC51-50A6-4EF8-9811-EF033F4C41B9 Mon, 31 Mar 2025 05:37:30 -0400 Racial disparities persist in survival rates for young athletes with cardiac arrest
